column2: "Afei Gileadnyi Jefta yɛ ɔbarimba katakyi a ɔyɛ ndam
column3: na ɔyɛ ɔbaa huhunyi bi ne ba: na n'egya nye Gilead."

column2: "Na Gilead ne yer woo mbabanyin maa no
column3: na aber a ne yer ne mbabanyin no nyinii no
column4: wɔpaam Jefta
column6: Mma nndzi adze wɔ hɛn egya fie; osiandɛ ɔsor ɔbaa a ɔwoo wo."

column2: "Nna Jefta guanee fii no nuanom nkyɛn
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa Tob asaase do: na akwasampafo bi boaa hɔn ano kɛkaa Jefta ho
column4: na wɔnye no puei."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n'ekyir mber kakra
column3: nna Ammonmba tuu Israel do sa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Ammonmba tuu Israel do sa no
column4: Gilead mpanyimfo sii mu kɔree kɛfaa Jefta wɔ Tob asaase no do;"

column2: "na wɔsee Jefta dɛ
column3: Bra bɛyɛ hɛn sahen
column4: ma yɛnye Ammonmba nkɔko."

column2: "Na Jefta bisaa Gilead mpanyimfo no dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ homara na wokyiir me
column4: na wɔpaam me fii m'egya fie no bi a? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na afei a hom wɔ ahohia mu yi dze hom reba me nkyɛn yi?"

column2: "Na Gilead mpanyimfo no see Jefta dɛ
column3: Dɛm ntsi na afei yɛadan aba wo nkyɛn bio yi
column4: ama enye hɛn aakɔ
column6: na ɔwoara yɛ hɛn tsitsir wɔ Gileadmba nyinara do."

column2: "Na Jefta see Gilead mpanyimfo no dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom dze me san kɔ fie bio ma menye Ammonmba kɔko
column4: na EWURADZE yi hɔn ma wɔ m'enyim a
column5: emi na mebɛyɛ hom mu tsitsir anaa?"

column2: "Na Gilead mpanyimfo no see Jefta dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nyɛ hɛn ntamu ɔdasefo; ampaara dɛ mbrɛ w'asɛm tse no dɛmara so na yɛbɛyɛ."

column2: "Nna Jefta nye Gilead mpanyimfo no sii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔman no yɛɛ no hɔn do tsitsir na hɔn sahen: na Jefta kaa ne nsɛm nyinara wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ Mizpa."

column2: "Na Jefta tuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Ammonmba ɔhen no hɔ
column3: dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na ewɔ nye me yɛ
column5: na aba mo do nye m'asaase robɔko yi?"

column2: "Na Ammonmba ɔhen no buaa Jefta n'abɔfoe no dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ aber a Israel fi Egypt reba no
column4: ɔfaa m'asaase
column5: ofi Ammon araa dze kodu Jabbok
column6: na Jordan do: dɛm ntsi dan asaase no ma me foo."

column2: "Na Jefta tuu abɔfo bio ma wɔkɔr Ammonmba no hɔ:"
"na ɔkɛsee no dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ Jefta se nye yi: Israel ammfa Moab asaase
column4: na Ammonmba asaase so bi:"

column2: "mbom aber a wofi Egypt bae no
column3: na Israel nantseew sar no do kodur Mbɛw Po no ho
column4: na wɔbaa Kades no;"

column2: "nna Israel tuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Edomhen hɔ
column3: dɛ
column4: Meserɛ wo
column5: ma muntwa mu wɔ w'asaase do: na Edomhen no enntsie. Na dɛmara so na ɔsomaa ma wɔkɔr Moabhen no so hɔ: na ɔammpen na Israel tsenaa Kades."

column2: "Nna ɔnantseew sar no do
column3: na ɔkɔbɔɔ Edom asaase
column4: na Moab asaase ho aprɔw
column5: na wobopuee Moab asaase no no boka afamu
column6: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Arnon egya no ho; na wɔammba Moab he no mu
column7: osiandɛ Arnon nye Moab he no."

column2: "Na Israel somaa abɔfo wɔ Amorifo hen Sihon
column3: Hesbonhen no
column4: hɔ; na Israel see no dɛ
column6: ma yentwa mu wɔ w'asaase do nkɔ m'asaase do."

column2: "Naaso Sihon ennya pɛ wɔ Israel ho dɛ ɔbɛma woetwa mu wɔ ne he do: na Sihon poon ne man nyinara hyiae
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Jahaz
column4: na wɔnye Israel koe."

column2: "Na EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: dze Sihon na ne man nyinara hyɛɛ Israel nsa
column5: na wokunkum hɔn: na Israel faa Amorifo asaase no nyinara
column6: ɔman no mu mba no a."

column2: "Na wɔfaa Amorifo he nyinara
column3: ofi Arnon do araa kodu Jabbok do
column4: na ofi sar no do araa kodu Jordan do."

column2: "Nna afei a EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: etu Amorifo efi ne man Israel enyim yi

column2: "Ana ennkɛfaa dza wo nyame Kemos (Kemos) dze maa wo dɛ fa no ara bi? Dɛm ntsi hɔn a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn etu hɔn efi hɛn enyim no hɔn na yɛbɛfa."
"Na afei ana ɔwo iye ara ma ɔsen Zipor babanyin Balak
column3: Moabhen no a? Ana ɔnye Israel dzii aper pɛn
column4: anaa ɔnye hɔn koo pɛn?"

column2: "Aber a Israel tsenaa Hesbon na no ho nkurow mu
column3: na Aroer na no ho nkurow mu
column4: na nkurow a ɔwɔ Arnon ho nyinara mu mfe ahaasa no; ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom anngye no wɔ aber no mu?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi emi mennyɛɛ wo bɔn bi
column3: mbom ɔwo na ereyɛ me bɔn dɛ irutu mo do sa: EWURADZE
column4: Ɔtsɛmbuafo no ɔnyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo ndɛ da yi wɔ Israelmba na Ammonmba ntamu."

column2: "Naaso Ammonmba hen no enntsie Jefta ne nsɛm a ɔdze somaa ma wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ no no."
"Nna EWURADZE no sunsum baa Jefta do
column3: na otwaa mu wɔ Gilead na Manaasɛ
column4: na otwaa mu kɔr Gilead-Mizpe
column5: na ofi Gilead-Mizpe twaa mu kɔr Ammonmba no do."

column2: "Na Jefta bɔɔ EWURADZE anohoba
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Sɛ edze Ammonmba no hyɛ me nsa ampa a
column7: biribiara a obefi me fi mbobow mu ebehyia me aber a meresan efi Ammonmba ho dwudwoodwo no
column9: na medze no bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Nna Jefta twaa mu kɔr Ammonmba no do dɛ ɔnye hɔn rokɔko; na EWURADZE dze hɔn hyɛɛ ne nsa."
"Na ɔdze okum kɛse paara kunkum hɔn fi Aroer araa dze kodu Minnit
column3: mekyerɛ nkurow eduonu
column4: na edze kodu Abel-keramin. Nna wɔberɛɛ Ammonmba no adze wɔ Israelmba no enyim."

column2: "Na Jefta baa ne fie Mizpa
column3: na
column4: hwɛ
column5: ne babaa dze mfuaba na asaw fiir edzi dɛ oribehyia no: na ɔnoara nye ne ba kortoo; onnyi ɔbabanyin anaa ɔbabaa ka no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ohun no no
column4: osunsuaan ne ntar mu
column7: me babaa! Abrɛ me adze dodoodow
column8: na ɔwo nye hɔn a wɔfona me no mu baako: osiandɛ mebue m'ano mama EWURADZE

column2: "Na ne ba no see no dɛ
column3: M'egya
column4: ebue w'ano ama EWURADZE yi dze; yɛ me dɛ mbrɛ efi w'anomu no ara; susuampa dɛ EWURADZE edzi w'atamfo do wer ama wo yi

column2: "Na ɔsee n'egya dɛ
column3: Ma wɔnyɛ iyi mma me: gyaa me abosoom ebien
column4: ma minsi mu minsian monkɔ mbepɔw do
column5: na emi na m'anyɛnkofo nkegyam me mbaabunyɛ ho."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Kɔ. Na ogyaa no kwan abosoom ebien: na osii mu kɔree
column4: ɔno na n'anyɛnkofo
column5: na okegyaam ne mbaabunyɛ ho wɔ mbepɔw do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ abosoom ebien no n'ewiei no
column3: ɔsanee baa n'egya hɔ
column4: ma ɔyɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ n'anohoba a ɔbɔe no tse no ara: na oennhu banyin biara. Na ɔyɛɛ atɔrmuadze wɔ Israel
column6: "dɛ afrenhyia pempem nyinara Israel mbabaa dze su kɛkaa Gileadnyi Jefta ne babaa no afrenhyia mu nda anan."
